column4: Hey, another noob question: When I try to start synaptix, an error box pops out and says there is an un-interactive synaptic already running
The one i'm trying to start, that is.
Ok, in my xorg.conf it says Identifier "Generic video card" Driver "nvidia", does this seem right?
you'll also need to be "ROOT" to edit your xorg.conf, so mak esure you use sudo.
just opinion i guess, but easyubuntu sucks... never liked it.
I see....will check it out though. :)
that doesn't make a lot of sense.
what makes you believe all of your sources are gone?
open a terminal and type sudo synaptic
you can always look in xorg.conf again and see if it recognized your card(since it said generic before)... sudo gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf
i honestly don't know enougha bout easy ubuntu to be anu use, but i'd try opening easy ubuntu, and uninstalling whatever i twas you installed.
